whySubscription.title: Why Subscription?
whySubscription.description: We continuously develop LONO Notes – new features, improvements, and updates are included in the subscription.

items.question: Why is there a subscription?
items.answer: LONO Notes is continuously being developed. New features, improvements, and analyses are included in the subscription – keeping the app up-to-date and useful long-term.

items.question: Is the free version really free?
items.answer: Yes. You can use LONO Notes for free to get to know the app. For long-term use, tracking, and analysis, there are optional in-app upgrades.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes. All upgrades are in-app purchases and can be canceled anytime through the App Store.

items.question: Why not a one-time purchase?
items.answer: LONO Notes is not a static product. The app grows with new features, better analyses, and improvements – the subscription enables this development.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Yes. Your data belongs to you. LONO Notes is GDPR-compliant and stores content securely and confidentially.

items.question: Do I have to share my data for AI?
items.answer: No. AI features are optional and only available in the Pro plan. Without an upgrade, your content remains purely manually usable.
